Description: Ingest and clean show- and performance-level ticketing data into analytics warehouse.
Load production, season, and venue metadata into dimension tables.
Inputs: Ticketing event setup, production planning sheets

Description: Pull email, digital ads, and budget data into analytics environment.
Inputs: Email platform, ad platforms, marketing budget spreadsheets

Description: Load macroeconomic, weather, and events data for Calgary and Edmonton.
Inputs: StatsCan, Alberta Govt, Environment Canada, event calendars

Description: Build show-level feature set combining production, sales, marketing, schedule, and external features.
Define and compute target variables (e.g., total tickets, load factor) for each production/city.
Assemble final modelling dataset with features, targets, and time-aware splits.
Train models predicting show-level ticket demand by city for planned productions.
Evaluate model accuracy (MAE, RMSE, R²) and monitor performance over time.
Score proposed titles early in season design to inform repertoire decisions.
Inputs: Planned productions metadata + external baseline data

Description: Score confirmed productions before marketing launch using final schedule and capacity.
Inputs: Confirmed production metadata, schedule, macro data

Description: Refresh forecasts mid-campaign based on early sales and marketing performance.
Inputs: Transaction-level sales, campaign metrics to date
Outputs: Revised run forecasts and risk flags
